transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan bolo haan ji
Customer: Haan bolo
Customer: Haan sir, Sunil Prakash baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Haan Mr. Kumar baat kar rahe hai Nivas of Industries se.
Executive: Haan bolo.
Customer: Ji sir, sir Prashant ne aapka ek issue raise kiya tha ki leads vagaira ka issue aa raha hai aapko. Sir Karnataka Karnataka mein chahiye kya aapko?
Executive: Nahi ji mai pehla karne se pehla Karnataka kuch bola tha mai.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Karnataka mein, whole Karnataka mein kaam kar sakte hai.
Executive: Haan mai mai ye mail hone ke baad mujhe Karnataka haan thik hai Karnataka ke dete ho karke bole ho.
Executive: Aayega to Karnataka kabhi par sir wo kam bhi ho sakta hai, jyada bhi ho sakta hai wo to requirement ke basis pe na daily basis pe ho sakta hai ki ek aaye do aaye.
Customer: Tumne ye baat ye baat aap bol rahe hai mai lene se pehla bola mai.
Executive: Mera small scale industries hai, chota hai. Haan mujhe Karnataka haan thik hai aapko Karnataka ka hota hai de de kar ke le aap.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Do mahine hua leke ek bhi order nahi diya. Aur jiska add bechte the wo pure chalk piece factory walon ka add bechte the.
Executive: Kiska add bechte the? Unka bhi factory rehta tha. Jo bechte the nahi by lead ke andar haan wo chalk piece factory walon ka hi bechte the.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Hmm. By lead check karo Hyderabad ka uska bhi factory hai unka ch humko bechte the.
Customer: To mai samajh gaya par sir dekho sirf Karnataka Karnataka se chahiye na to leads to hum log sure nahi ho sakte sir ki hum kitna flow de de. Nahi ye baat to tum aap bol rahe ho ye ye ye baat ye baat tum aap bol rahe ho mai upload karne se pehla tumhare company ko paisa bharne se pehla mai khulla baat kiya tha.
Executive: To mai samajh raha hu aapne bilkul bataya hoga par aisa nahi hai mai nahi kar raha hu ki mere pass Karnataka se leads nahi aayenge sir. Mai iske liye bhi mana nahi kar raha hu aayega sir. Bas mai aap se ye bol raha hu na ki total kitna aayega kitna nahi aayega wo confirm type nahi hai sir matlab har din ka hum koi aapko ek number promise nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Sir mai promise pehli baat nahi hai mai bol raha hu mai tumhare isme add hone se pehla pehla hi bola tha khulla. Ye small scale industries hai chalk piece ka hai humko waha se aata hai yaha se aata hai bole jitna aane ke baad chalo tumhari baat maan ke mai kiya. Pura ka pura chalk piece factory walon ka hi lead diye mujhe factory walon ka hi lead diye.
Executive: Factory walon ka nahi. A a haan Agra ko aye tumhare pass carry kam hua to hamare pass le lo ji factory walon ka ch ko lead aaya. Abhi bhi dekho tum ek Hyderabad ka hai lead uska kya hai factory aur factory walon ka hai lead.
Executive: Jo factory jo factory kuch bana raha hai usi ka lead aa raha hai aapke pass. Ye ho raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Jyada se jyada jo mai delete kiya dekho haan. Factory walon ka ch. Sir matlab sir kya kare matlab aage chalana hai isko nahi kare kaise kare sir?
Customer: Kya nahi wo ye bola na mai aapko revise kar do kar ke aapke yaha se kaam nahi hota revise kar do kar ke.
Executive: To mai tabhi to phone leke aap se connect kar raha hu na iske liye. Haan revise kar do ye jitna hota utna. Haan. Aur kya hua sir? Haan amount hai amount wo amount ye kar do return dal do amount. Service deactivate karke refund wo karwa dunga aapko. Kya bole? Ji sir wo matlab service band karwa ke aapka refund karwa do ye bol raha hu. Haan.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Lekin sir Karnataka Karnataka se location nahi badha sakte sir transportation vagaira kuch kar ke. Nahi sir ye chalk piece jyada door ko toot ta hai. Haan pura gaadi nahi leta aadmi haan iska ye rehta pura bhi. Ye kam amount ka hai 10 rupaye ke andar nikalne ka hai bada 100 200 ka 500 ka maal nahi hai 10 rupaye ka dabba rehta hai bas chalk piece ka dabba kitna 5 rupaye me bahar padta hai. Haan. Hmm hmm thik hai. Thik hai sir mai kya karta hu na ek baat ki aapka service dekhiye dekho sir kyuki pura sure nahi hu ab aise mai aapko baar baar wo kar ke mai delay nahi kar sakta thik hai. Agar wo numbers nahi aa pa raha to to mai aapka service deactivate kar ke na sir jitna din ka service use hua uska refund karwa deta hu thik hai. Jitna din use hua uska refund kar ke baki aapka paisa wapas karwa deta hu. Thik hai thik hai. Thik hai thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received only chalk piece factory leads.

- Wants leads from Karnataka only.

- Dissatisfied as no orders received in two months.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to deactivate service.

- Executive will process refund for unused service.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, deactivation, location
